About

IKM background connection manager for IM-using queue handlers, allowing them to send outgoing messages on the right connection.

In a multi-site queuedaemon.php run, one connection will be instantiated for each site being handled by the current process that has IM enabled.

Implementations that extend this class will likely want to

1) override start() with their connection process.  2) override handleInput() with what to do when data is waiting on one of the sockets 3) override idle($timeout) to do keepalives (if necessary) 4) implement send_raw_message() to send raw data that ImPlugin::enqueueOutgoingRaw enqueued

PHP version

Tested with PHP 5.6

File Authors

ImManager

IKM background connection manager for IM-using queue handlers, allowing them to send outgoing messages on the right connection.

In a multi-site queuedaemon.php run, one connection will be instantiated for each site being handled by the current process that has IM enabled.

Implementations that extend this class will likely want to

1) override start() with their connection process.  2) override handleInput() with what to do when data is waiting on one of the sockets 3) override idle($timeout) to do keepalives (if necessary) 4) implement send_raw_message() to send raw data that ImPlugin::enqueueOutgoingRaw enqueued
